title: Suspect Arrested, Charged in Fatal Shooting at 11290 Fondren
content:
Houston Police Department
houstonpolice.org
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
Charges have been filed against a suspect arrested in the fatal shooting of a male at 11290 Fondren about 7 p.m. last Friday (April 10).
The suspect, Jesse L. Davis (b/m, 17), is charged with manslaughter in the 338th State District Court. A photo of Davis is attached to this news release.
The victim, Ezra Ryan Jackson, 16, was transported to an area hospital where he was pronounced dead.
HPD Homicide Division Sergeant H. Garcia and Officer J. Horn reported:
Mr. Jackson was driving a vehicle with the suspect, Davis, and other teenagers when they stopped for fuel at a gas station at the above address. The suspect, Davis, told investigators he was handling a gun and unintentionally discharged it, striking Jackson. Jackson exited the vehicle and collapsed a few feet away. He was transported to an area hospital where he was pronounced dead.
Jesse L. Davis
KJS/JFC 4-13-15
